# 课堂练习

- 在散点图图层上，用三种构建图层方法，添加每组的均值
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)

penguins <- penguins %>% 
  drop_na()
```


```{r}
penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = species, y = bill_length_mm)) +
  geom_point() 
```




方法1
```{r}
penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = species, y = bill_length_mm)) +
  geom_point() +
  stat_summary(
    geom  = "point",
    fun   = "mean",
    color = "red", 
    size  = 5
  )
```




方法2
```{r}
penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = species, y = bill_length_mm)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_point(
    stat  = "summary",
    fun   = mean,
    color = "red",
    size  = 5
  )
```




方法3
```{r}
penguins %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = species, y = bill_length_mm)) +
  geom_point() +
  layer(
    geom     = "point",
    stat     = "summary",
    params   = list(fun = "mean", color = "red", size = 5),
    position = "identity"
  )
```
